definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Vico is the first theoretician who demonstrated the primitive thinking in the idealistic history.
sentences.chinese: 维柯是思想史上第一个论证原始思维的理论家。

sentences.english: Learning theoreticians call this concentration on the reality as 'context'.
sentences.chinese: 学习理论家将这种对现实的专注称之为“情境”。

sentences.english: Luji is one important writer and theorist of arts during Wei and Jin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 陆机是我国魏晋之际的重要作家和文学理论家。

sentences.english: J. J Rousseau was a famous French educational theorist in the Age of Enlightenment. Emel, J.
sentences.chinese: 卢梭是启蒙时期法国著名的教育理论家。

sentences.english: Yu Qiuyu is a famous scholar in China, artistic theoretician and essay writer.
sentences.chinese: 中国著名文化学者，艺术理论家和散文作家。

sentences.english: The theorists have high I.Q.’s but don’t seem to know much psychology.
sentences.chinese: 理论家的智商很高，但是似乎对心理学知之甚少。

sentences.english: LI Yu was one famous drama theoretician of Chinese ancient.
sentences.chinese: 李渔是中国古代著名的戏曲理论家。

sentences.english: These Demand Side theorists are giving you a plan of action.
sentences.chinese: 这些需求方面的理论家正向你提供一项行动计划。

sentences.english: Hufeng was a famous literary theorist of China in 20th century.
sentences.chinese: 胡风是20世纪中国著名的文艺理论家。

sentences.english: Alternative economic theorists are thrown Nobels and quickly marginalized.
sentences.chinese: 替代的经济理论家被诺贝尔奖排斥并很快边缘化。
这就是阴谋理论家所做的。

sentences.english: And then become body theorists,if there are no souls.
sentences.chinese: 然后变成肉体理论家，假如没有灵魂存在。

sentences.english: We can avoid all of that if we become body theorists.
sentences.chinese: 成为肉体理论家就能避免那些问题了。

sentences.english: One theorist played an essential role in Rutherford's thinking.
sentences.chinese: 在卢瑟福的思考中一位理论家起到了关键作用。

sentences.english: Kuang Zhouyi was an excellent writer and theoretician of Ci in Late Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 况周颐是晚清重要词人和词学理论家。

definition: jurist/member of the pre-Han legalist school
